**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:

When trying to forcefully update `podDistributionBudget` using `kubectl apply --force -f pdb.json` command segmentatio voliation happens.

```
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x20 pc=0x15dcc0b]

goroutine 1 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource.(*Helper).DeleteWithOptions(0xc420a7e200, 0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, 0xc4201cc92c, 0x4, 0x0, 0xc420a7e200, 0x20933ff)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource/helper.go:103 +0x3b
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource.(*Helper).Delete(0xc420a7e200, 0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, 0xc4201cc92c, 0x4, 0xc420a1e700, 0x0)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource/helper.go:99 +0x5c
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.runDelete(0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, 0xc4201cc92c, 0x4, 0xc42026d260, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc420471900, 0x1, 0xffffffffffffffff, ...)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/apply.go:523 +0x221
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.(*patcher).delete(0xc42026d960, 0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, 0xc4201cc92c, 0x4, 0x1a6, 0xc4206aef70)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/apply.go:536 +0x9c
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.(*patcher).deleteAndCreate(0xc42026d960, 0xc42094b500, 0x2e7, 0x2e7, 0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, 0xc4201cc92c, 0x4, 0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, ...)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/apply.go:623 +0x63
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.(*patcher).patch(0xc42026d960, 0x2e41da0, 0xc420479a48, 0xc42094b500, 0x2e7, 0x2e7, 0x208d32a, 0x5, 0xc4201cc95c, 0x4, ...)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/apply.go:617 +0x43a
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.RunApply.func1(0xc4201d4c00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x9, 0x15e6501)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/apply.go:320 +0x76a
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource.ContinueOnErrorVisitor.Visit.func1(0xc4201d4c00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource/visitor.go:348 +0x153
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource.DecoratedVisitor.Visit.func1(0xc4201d4c00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource/visitor.go:324 +0xdf
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource.FlattenListVisitor.Visit.func1(0xc4201d4c00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource/visitor.go:389 +0x572
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/resource.EagerVisitorList.Visit.func1(0xc4201d4c00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x1c0, 0x208d32a)

...
```

**What you expected to happen**:

podDistributionBudget to be replaced

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

create `pdb.json`:

```
{
  "apiVersion": "policy/v1beta1",
  "kind": "PodDisruptionBudget",
  "metadata": {
    "name": "test"
  },
  "spec": {
    "minAvailable": "60%",
    "selector": {
      "matchLabels": {
        "name": "myapp"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Create `podDistributionBudget`:

```
kubectl apply -f pdb.json
```

Forcefull update (replace) `podDistributionBudget`:

```
kubectl apply -f pdb.json --force
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:

The same error happens on kubectl version 1.6 or 1.7. Manually deleting and recreating `podDistributionBudget` works.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 1.7
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: gke
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Debian GNU/Linux 7 (wheezy)
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 3.16.0-4-amd64
